{"name": "Self-Service DTA Kiosk at Father Bill's & Mainspring (limited services available)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Parking**
* There is parking.

**Services**
* There is an official Department of Transitional Assistance Kiosk at this location with access to the DTA Connect mobile application and website. [Learn what you can do through DTA Connect.](https://www.mass.gov/guides/how-to-contact-dta)

***PLEASE NOTE:***
These locations are not staffed by DTA employees.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mass.gov/locations/self-service-dta-kiosk-at-father-bills-mainspring-limited-services-available", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "430 Belmont Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Brockton", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02301", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.07637769999999, "longitude": -71.0369158}, "phones": [{"number": "(877) 382-2363", "type": "voice"}]}
